name: BINGIMAN: Trap Ochido
description:
BINGIMAN:Trap Ochido is a retro shooter-inspired action game with a sinister African aesthetic through its voodoo and gunplay art direction.
Evil demons have invaded the neighborhood and BINGIMAN has been summoned to fight through waves of relentless enemies with heavy artillery to save the streets from total annihilation.

Success depends on how fast and strategic a player moves and the choice of weapon used to execute an enemy AI.
The gameplay involves melee and ranged attacks. Every weapon is unique and guns have two fire modes. Players can equip weapons and customize them as they progress through the game.
Enemies are relentless, you can run but you can't hide.

The game features music composed by Alcapaul, Wuod Baba, Deryque, Dead Noize and more.
